message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair!
I'll give you a slightly less than even split, but it's still a good deal!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a slightly more even split is fair.  Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not giving up yet! I think I can do better than that. Let's see what you're willing to give me.
Okay, Bob, I'm starting to think this is getting out of hand.  I'm willing to take a little less to avoid the risk of getting nothing.  Let's try this.
